responsibilities: Co-taught 10th and 11th-grade World History classes, developing and delivering lesson plans aligned with state standards.
Facilitated small group discussions and activities to improve student engagement and comprehension of historical events.
Utilized classroom management strategies to maintain a productive and respectful learning environment for diverse student populations.
Graded essays, exams, and projects, providing detailed feedback to support student academic development.
Assumed full teaching responsibilities for a 9th-grade English Literature course during a permanent teacher's leave of absence.
Implemented differentiated instruction techniques to cater to students with varying learning abilities and IEP requirements.
Collaborated with department heads to ensure curriculum continuity and participation in faculty meetings.
Maintained accurate records of student attendance, participation, and grades.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
